name: Shoot Em Space Rocks!
description:
Shoot Em Space Rocks! is an arcade-like space game where you try to survive the onslaught of asteroids and destroying them to build up your score.

Credits:

Music created by  Mellohyu, his Game Jam game - https://mellohyu.itch.io/oskays-adventure

Menu art by Bugaboo

Asset packs used:

Asteroids Pack by Mark Dion

Federation Corvette F3 Pack by CGPitbull
